title: Delhi HC rules in favor of IHCL, permanently bars 'Taj Iconic' from using 'Taj' name
description: The Delhi High Court has ruled that Taj Iconic Membership's managing director is permanently restrained from using the 'Taj' name, logo, and content. The court also directed the transfer of Taj Iconic's domain to The Indian Hotels Co Ltd (IHCL). Taj Iconic was found guilty of trademark infringement and defrauding a jeweller of gold coins worth Rs 51 lakh.
